natural solution: We multiply fractions by multiplying their numerators and denominators. The given expression, $\frac{3a^2b}{5ac}\times\frac{10c}{6ab}$, becomes $\frac{3a^2b\cdot10c}{5ac\cdot6ab}=\frac{30a^2bc}{30a^2bc}=\boxed{1}$, since any nonzero number divided by itself is 1.
